attributes.title: Wow app ever
attributes.review: This app constantly spammed me with texts without my consent to do so. It made my phone super slow and glitchy. I recommend not getting this app it will mess up your phone! My phone has never overheated so much in my life!

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: this app broke down my phone as soon as i downloaded it and after that i had to deal with all the glitches once my phone was back on and then a bear came and ate my cat. i cannot stress this enough, this app is AWFUL

attributes.title: Traumatizing
attributes.review:
I 👀 climbed out of my head 🥵 and watched myself implode 🤯 a thought without a body 🧍‍♀️ought to be the shot 🍻 to take a load off my brain is poisoned 🤢
and I’m searching 🔬 for the antidote 💊 but every time I find it 🔍 my defenses 🙅‍♀️ scream  “oh, no you don’t!”

Woah 👁 👄 👁

attributes.title: Gave me a rash!!
attributes.review: Okey I thought I would love an app that shares the important news and facts surrounding our beloved dictator. BUT I WAS WRONG!! The navigation is so poor I got really stressed out and when I stress I get sweaty and when I sweat I get rashes so this app perpetuated that!! Do not recommend!!

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: This app forces its users to be racist and homophobic!! My pet turtle was scrolling through it yesterday and afterwards he started saying things completely inappropriate and racist. I think he might’ve been looking in the Trump quote section but it’s just a hunch. O 🐳

attributes.title: i love cheese
attributes.review: i downloaded this app excited and pumped to see the president but just being in the app for a minute caused me to go blind by the stupidity that was being said. i’m all for apps but this one is not it nether is the person that the app was centered around. anywaysssss BLM

attributes.title: App is trash
attributes.review: Ik trump is not trying to take down TikTok some people in there were the ones who  caused him to think a lot of people were going to his rally then ended up being little to no people don’t mess with TikTok also this app is trash and THIS APP SHOULD BE DELETED BYE😌✌🏼

attributes.title: Credit card fraud
attributes.review: I downloaded the app and then some one from a different country hacked into my apple account and spent $500 from my Apple Pay????? I literally have never seen anything like this! Worst app ever!!

attributes.title: It gives you corona virus
attributes.review: I didn’t show any symptoms until after I downloaded the app. I was almost perfect ,but now I am scared that I will test positive. If you don’t want to get COVID 19 don’t download this app a give similar reviews to spread the word

attributes.title: Don’t get
attributes.review: Horrible app makes your phone glitch, drains your battery, so many ads. I could go on and on if I wanted to but I don’t all I want to say is don’t get this app it’s so bad you might as well delete it.
